Shivah:

"The base in underwater... look the screen"said Shivah while screen 
showed Alecto, who Was fightting for her life.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Wilthram Ponth" <Rudra656@a...> wrote:
> ::Ender::
>     He nods gravely.  "This doesn't sound like it will be a fun 
> battle.  What can you tell me about the base?"  He sits at the 
table 
> away from the others.  His eyes dart between them.
